fields.text: added seed data for phases steps and participants in cold_apply
set minimum job description length to 30 words including stops
reduced autoclose time to 3 seconds
refactored and reduced the autoclose time to 5 seconds
added create title and company buttons to job update view
removed fk relationship between title and participant
added status reason to job create view
added seed data for organization and position in resume
added app seed data in releases
added company update link to job detail view
refactored cancel buttons to close browser tabs
title update link added to job detail view
refactored seed data into single call
created general feedback and feedback admin dashboards
added total and unread comment counter to release_list view for admins
fixed file uploads for new and updated participants
added tailored resumes including overview and bullet statements for each job
separated bullet_create template and adjusted job detail to show all keywords
added create company and title to experience_create page
added a button to create work experience for a participant on the targeted resume view
improved performance of weighting algorithm and refactored to use stems instead of whole words
added overview create to tailored resume page
limited bullet points per job
added experience and overview update functionality
added bullet edit button update functionality
improved experience creation flow
added create experience link to participant detail page
updated media url usage
made uploaded resume viewable on participant detail page
limited the number of bullets based on how old the experience
refactored main recommendation view
reordered participants orgs and position titles
Initial release of this app
Updated reference rate default to the U.S. but adjusts with level selection
